
# pomotimer-py

A simple pomodoro timer written in Shiny for Python.

# app link

- [Github pages](https://parmsam.github.io/pomotimer-py/site/)

# Installation

To generate the project using Shinylive, I ran the following command within the project directory:
- `shinylive export . site --full-shinylive`
